DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Parent-Led Interventions Reducing Infant Hypersensitivity Pain
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy infant undergoing vaccination . 1. preterm birth ( < 37 week gestation ) 2. prior hospitalization/surgery ( postnatal care ) , 3. documented/ suspect sensitivity/allergy amide anaesthetics/vaccines , 4. mother plan breastfeed use topical anesthetic sugar water injection .
